title: Chat
text: Chat SPA with user-created channels and login functionalities. Custom REST API coded with Node.js. Connects to PostgreSQL database. Real-time messaging implemented with Server Sent Events.

title: Custom designed website
text: Responsive website based on custom-made Figma design. Made with React and Styled Components. Connects to Contentful CMS and uses GraphQL for querying.

title: RPG Game
text: Browser RPG game created with vanilla JS. Some of the implemented features include travelling through different locations containing unique monsters, gathering new equipment, and gaining levels
